description:
Dakota was all set to get fucked by a dude, but when it came down to actually doing it, he just couldn't do it.
I hadn't planned on doing a Serviced video with Dakota, but given his flight risk, I thought I would ease him in to being filmed. It's the cameras that really makes him shy, not the fear of butt fucking for the first time. So I deliberately kept cameras surrounding him so he could get used to it.
Not one of my better Serviced videos as far as angles go. I am frustratingly off center several frame ups. So you have to forgive me, this is one of the few videos where I completely forgot about the cameras and was in to sucking cock. I didn't want to spend a lot of time starting and stopping to move 'em around for fear that Dakota would get distracted.
Ironically, I didn't have to worry. Dakota was real submissive, and we shot this pretty much straight though. We stopped a couple times as he came too close to busting. This video would have been about 3 minutes long otherwise.
I think he is ready to jump in bed with a guy. He seems to like more mature type guys, and I need someone who can guide him and make him feel comfortable.
Stay tuned for his G:hole video in a couple weeks!
title: Bryan & Dakota - Serviced
